alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; DeSoto; Quitman; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:18PM CDT until April 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL PHILLIPS...WESTERN DESOTO...COAHOMA...TUNICA...WESTERN TATE AND WESTERN QUITMAN COUNTIES... At 518 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Robinsonville to near Jonestown to 6 miles southwest of Clarksdale, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Horn Lake, Clarksdale, Hernando, Elaine, Helena-West Helena, St Francis National Park, Jonestown, Friars Point, Walls, Tunica, Crenshaw, Belen, Lake Cormorant, Strayhorn, Eudora, Dubbs, North Tunica, Dundee and Arkabutla. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
